resources.string: Emergency services are available in NYC.
This is a map of local public restrooms.
"CVS: 50% off all deodorants May 15th-20th.\n" "Happy Spring! CVS will be offering 50% off all deodorant products with a purchase of $5 or more.\n"
"Target: Buy One Get One Free on Oatmeal\n" "Looking for a healthy breakfast option for the whole family? From now until June 1st, when you buy one box of oatmeal, get the second one FREE!\n"
"7-11: 15% off water cases\n" "This deal applies with a purchase of $10 or more. Get Dasani or Aquafina water cases 15% off!"
"Aldi: Everyday low prices.\n" "Get ready-to-eat meals for as low as $5 from now until the end of the season. Feed the whole family!"
"iHop: Join iHop rewards today!\n" "Enjoy daily specials, with entrees starting at just $6. Get 20% off your first online order with the code IHOP20."
"Macy's: Sale on basics\n" "From now until June 1st, save big on basics! Shirts and blouses up to 20% off. Shorts and trousers up to 25% off."
"MTA: Discount on MetroCards\n" "Get a MetroCard this season! Now when you swipe 15 times in one week with the same card, you ride free for the rest of the week."

"Planet Fitness: Join today!\n" "Join today for just $10 and get two free months of membership! Valid until September. Enjoy our facilities including state-of-the-art equipment, showers, and locker rooms."
"Shoppers savings\n" "This summer, enjoy savings on basic hygiene items. Get 15% off period products from now until July 30th."
"Walgreens: $2 off bath tissue\n" "In the month of May, when you make a purchase of $3 or more, get $2 off bath tissue. Good for up to 10 uses."
